rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming space aligned with Vastu principles, ensuring positive energy flow. It includes a small seating area and storage for coats.

rooms.name: Guest Toilet
rooms.description: For guest convenience, located near the entrance following proper building norms.

rooms.name: Drawing Room/ Living Area
rooms.description: A modern living space with open design to connect with the garden area and pool view. Includes large windows for natural light.

rooms.name: Family Room
rooms.description: Cozy room designed for family gatherings, adhering to Vastu guidelines ensuring balance in the layout.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Well-equipped contemporary kitchen with modern amenities and proper ventilation as per local building codes.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen for easy serving, designed following Vastu recommendations for dining space.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an attached bathroom and closet, placed in a direction that promotes health as per Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Guest Bedrooms
rooms.description: Two guest bedrooms designed for flexibility in family use, with windows ensuring natural light and air circulation.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: General bathroom serving the ground floor with facilities following building norms.

openings.description: Large windows ensuring ample natural light and maintaining a balance as per Vastu guidelines.
Sturdy door for main entry following local building norms with safety features.

openings.location: Patio Door to Swimming Pool Area
openings.description: Transitional space connecting the villa interior with the outdoor swimming pool and garden area.

facilities.name: Swimming Pool
facilities.description: Contemporary style swimming pool designed to blend with the outdoor living space. It is placed in a location ensuring privacy and adherence to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Enhanced master bedroom with a private balcony facing east to welcome the morning sun, adhering to Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Guest Bedrooms
rooms.description: Additional guest rooms providing privacy and comfort for extended family members. Windows are designed to maximize light as per local norms.

rooms.name: Study Room
rooms.description: Dedicated workspace with sufficient natural lighting and ventilation, following modern design trends and Vastu recommendations.

rooms.name: Balcony/ Terrace
rooms.description: Spacious terrace area for relaxation and enjoying views, ensuring proper alignment with Vastu principles regarding open spaces.

openings.description: Window providing a view of the sunrise and ensuring natural light as per Vastu guidelines.
Sturdy door for balcony access designed to integrate with the villa's modern look and adhere to building norms.
Skylight for natural ventilation and light, designed in compliance with local norms.

facilities.name: Outdoor Lounge Area
facilities.description: Modern outdoor lounge area for relaxation and gatherings, ensuring privacy and alignment with Vastu principles.
